item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Oliver Heaviside and the theory of transmission lines (2021) (51 points | 6 comments)
2. My failed attempt to shrink all NPM packages by 5% (9 points | discuss)
3. SiFive's P550 Microarchitecture (26 points | 5 comments)

6. Show HN: Making AR experiences is still painful – had to make my own editor (87 points | 19 comments)
7. Hedy: Textual programming made easy (131 points | 34 comments)
8. Openhaystack: Build 'AirTags' – track Bluetooth devices via Apple's network (308 points | 66 comments)
9. Lessons in creating family photos that people want to keep (2018) (255 points | 99 comments)
10. Show HN: Bagels – TUI expense tracker (160 points | 57 comments)
11. Hard numbers in the Wayland vs. X11 input latency discussion (494 points | 380 comments)

14. Using generative AI as part of historical research: three case studies (220 points | 186 comments)
15. Sweden Seizes Ship Suspected of Baltic Sea 'Sabotage' (121 points | 119 comments)
16. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (227 points | 84 comments)

19. Halliday AR(Not?)/AI Glasses (8 points | 3 comments)
20. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (176 points | 45 comments)

22. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (253 points | 128 comments)
23. Marginalia – A search engine that prioritizes non-commercial content (416 points | 46 comments)
24. Amsterdam Compiler Kit for Cray X-MP (81 points | 10 comments)
25. No one is disrupting banks – at least not the big ones (153 points | 249 comments)
26. Autodesk partially restores old forum posts (73 points | 17 comments)
27. Astronomers delete asteroid because it turned out to be Tesla Roadster (233 points | 73 comments)
28. Show HN: A new native app for 20 year old OS X (117 points | 21 comments)
29. Show HN: DeepSeek My User Agent (305 points | 123 comments)
30. Hyperbound (YC S23) is hiring a Founding Account Executive in SF ( | hide)
